TunableList.name: COWORKER_TRACK_FILTER_BITS
TunableList.description: A set of relationship bits that will be used in the Sim Picker and the Relationship Panel for filtering sims met through careers. If a Sim has any of these bits then they will be displayed when the filter is active.

Tunable.description: A specific bit used for filtering coworkers in the Sim Picker.

Tunable.name: FRIENDSHIP_TRACK
Tunable.description: A reference to the friendship track so that the client knows which track is the friendship one.

TunableList.name: FRIENDSHIP_TRACK_FILTER_BITS
TunableList.description: A set of relationship bits that will be used in the Sim Picker for filtering based on friendship. If a Sim has any of these bits then they will be displayed in the Sim Picker when filtering for romance.

Tunable.description: A specific bit used for filtering romance in the Sim Picker.

Tunable.name: FRIENDSHIP_TRACK_FILTER_THRESHOLD
Tunable.description: Value that the client will use when filtering friendship on the Sim Picker. Sims that have a track value equal to or above this value will be shown with the friendship filter.

Tunable.name: ROMANCE_TRACK
Tunable.description: A reference to the romance track so that the client knows which track is the romance one.

TunableList.name: ROMANCE_TRACK_FILTER_BITS
TunableList.description: A set of relationship bits that will be used in the Sim Picker for filtering based on romance. If a Sim has any of these bits then they will be displayed in the Sim Picker when filtering for romance.

Tunable.description: A specific bit used for filtering romance in the Sim Picker.

Tunable.name: ROMANCE_TRACK_FILTER_THRESHOLD
Tunable.description: Value that the client will use when filtering romance on the Sim Picker. Sims that have a track value equal to or above this value will be shown with the romance filter.

TunableList.name: ROOMMATE_TRACK_FILTER_BITS
TunableList.description: A set of relationship bits that will be used in the Sim Picker and the Relationship Panel for filtering roommate sims. If a Sim has any of these bits then they will be displayed when the filter is active.

Tunable.description: A specific bit used for filtering roommates in the Sim Picker.

Tunable.name: SIM_TO_PET_FRIENDSHIP_TRACK
Tunable.description: A reference to the sim_to_pet_friendship track so that the client knows which track is the sim to pet friendship track.

Tunable.name: SIM_TO_PET_FRIENDSHIP_TRACK_FILTER_THRESHOLD
Tunable.display: Sim To Pet Friendship Track Filter Threshold
Tunable.description: Value that the client will use when filtering friendship on the Sim Picker. Pets that have a track value equal to or above this value will be shown with the friendship filter.

TunableList.name: OBJECT_BASED_FRIENDSHIP_TRACKS
TunableList.description: A mapping of sets of objects with a specific tag to a friendship track. Any value added to the tuned track will apply to all objects within the set.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: This track can be referenced by all objects with the tuned tag.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: Tags that define the objects in the track.
